name: SawJumper
description:
Use moving platforms to navigate your way to the end and avoid the dangerous saw blades.

Includes saw blades, moving platforms, climbing on top of blocks, more sawblades, and maybe even some pie.

controls (keyboard / gamepad):
mouse / rstick- look
wasd / lstick- move
space / south button - dash jump, climb
shift  / north button - center camera

Made for Disc Room Game Jam
